Now we know why REST API calls are stateless. With this implementation quality in mind, I can't take Azure serious any more. What tool or software did you use to call the API?
PS: Assuming 10 bits for a character (asynchronous) it's 30 character per second. So in this case it takes 64 seconds ~ 1 min.

comments.html: Watch your Azure bills! I once deleted multiple resource groups and it ended up with ghost resources: they appear in the bills but you can't find them anywhere. Get the detailed usage report via CLI "az consumption usage list" and make sure you provide a date range, otherwise the CLI may hang.
